items.summary: Update the deployment documentation to include an explicit “clean rebuild and redeploy” procedure that clears local build artifacts/caches and then rebuilds + redeploys the project, including a short troubleshooting section for intermittent Caffeine draft deployment failures (e.g., retry guidance) and the known draft preview issue showing `draft-editor:error disallowed origin: https://just-olive-eim-draft.caffeine.xyz`. All user-facing text in the docs must be in English.
